body:
FINALLY!
It only took 22 years, but finally we have a proper translation instead of that shitty rewrite.
This was probably the only  Saigado KOF doujin without an english translation.
I agree with @R3PTIL3 , Saigado's new works are boring, i wish he (or she?) would go back at making KOF doujins in this style, these were the best!
22 years and still one of the best KOF doujins. Aaah... good Saigado old times. His actual works are boring as hell.
There is not much hentai about Kasumi Todho
